description.@en: The Steward makes specific demands from His priesthood. They must always obey their superiors, always honor surrender, and never kill their prisoners unless in self-defense. Unfortunately, this often puts them at odds with the followers of the Winter King, who embrace warmongering as a means to an end.

effect.@en: When you would normally invoke a Chaos Manifestation, you instead provoke Punishments of the Steward. In addition, you are bound by the commandments of your god. You must seek atonement if you violate these commandments.
